description: Scheduled audits can be used to specify the checks you want to perform during an audit and how often the audit should be run.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

ScheduledAuditName.description: The name you want to give to the scheduled audit.
ScheduledAuditName.markdownDescription:
The name you want to give to the scheduled audit.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 128  

Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9:_-]+  

Update requires: No interruption

Frequency.description: How often the scheduled audit takes place. Can be one of DAILY, WEEKLY, BIWEEKLY, or MONTHLY.
Frequency.markdownDescription:
How often the scheduled audit takes place. Can be one of DAILY, WEEKLY, BIWEEKLY, or MONTHLY.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

DayOfMonth.description: The day of the month on which the scheduled audit takes place. Can be 1 through 31 or LAST. This field is required if the frequency parameter is set to MONTHLY.
DayOfMonth.markdownDescription:
The day of the month on which the scheduled audit takes place. Can be 1 through 31 or LAST. This field is required if the frequency parameter is set to MONTHLY.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^([1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01])$|^LAST$  

Update requires: No interruption

DayOfWeek.description: The day of the week on which the scheduled audit takes place. Can be one of SUN, MON, TUE,WED, THU, FRI, or SAT. This field is required if the frequency parameter is set to WEEKLY or BIWEEKLY.
DayOfWeek.markdownDescription:
The day of the week on which the scheduled audit takes place. Can be one of SUN, MON, TUE,WED, THU, FRI, or SAT. This field is required if the frequency parameter is set to WEEKLY or BIWEEKLY.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

TargetCheckNames.description: Which checks are performed during the scheduled audit. Checks must be enabled for your account.
TargetCheckNames.markdownDescription:
Which checks are performed during the scheduled audit. Checks must be enabled for your account.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

ScheduledAuditArn.description: The ARN (Amazon resource name) of the scheduled audit.
ScheduledAuditArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN (Amazon resource name) of the scheduled audit.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 20  

Maximum Length: 2048   

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption
